name: xy-k2so-enhancements
title: xyrc's K2SO Enhancements
author: xyrc
description: Laundry list of tweaks, fixes, and overall enhancements to Krastorio 2 Spaced Out for compatability with other mods, consistency changes, and balancing. Adds sprited tech cards to a lot of mods. Patches vehicles added by other mods to work with K2's equipment system. Patches can be toggled in settings.
